com.ppfold.algo.extradata

Class SHAPEData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ppfold.algo.extradata.SHAPEData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExtraData

    public class SHAPEData
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExtraData
    Static class to define the model for how to deal with SHAPE data as well as container for the actual data
    Author:
    Z.Sukosd

      • getProbabilityGivenOuterPaired

        public float getProbabilityGivenOuterPaired(int position1,
                                   int position2)
        Description copied from interface: ExtraData
        Returns the probability of observing the particular data given that the nucleotides in the input are paired with each other. The position is given in ALIGNMENT coordinates so implementations of ExtraData must return values relevant for the alignment, not individual sequences.
        Specified by:
        getProbabilityGivenOuterPaired in interface ExtraData
